庅字的基本解释

庅
古同“麽”。

庅
mó
古同“麽”。

庅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mó］
［《集韻》眉波切，平戈，明。］
亦作“庅1”。“么2”的繁体字。亦作“麼1”。
细小。
[②]［ma˙］
亦作“庅2”。“么3”的繁体字。亦作“摩2”。亦作“麼2”。
(1)助词。用同“嗎”。用在句末表示疑问。
(2)助词。用同“嗎”。用在句中停顿处，点出话题。
(3)助词。用同“呵”。
(4)助词。用同“嘛”。表示道理显而易见。
[③]［me˙］
亦作“庅3”。“么4”的繁体字。亦作“没3”。亦作“麼3”。
(1)“這麽”、“那麽”的省文。
(2)后缀。
(3)用作歌词的衬字。

庅字的康熙字典解释
庅字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
庅字的起名意思

暂无。

庅
Basic explanation of words
庅
The ancient same "what".
庅
mó
The ancient same "what".
庅
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mó］
["Ji Yun" Meiboqie, Ping Ge, Ming. ]
Also known as "庅1". The traditional characters of "么2". Also known as "What 1".
small.
[②]［ma˙］
Also known as "庅2". The traditional characters of "么3". Also known as "Motor 2". Also known as "What 2".
(1) Auxiliary words. Use the same "?". Used at the end of a sentence to express doubt.
(2) Auxiliary words. Use the same "?". Use it at the pause in the sentence to point out the topic.
(3) Particles. Use the same "hee".
(4) Particles. Use the same "Well". The reason is obvious.
[③] [me˙]
Also known as "庅3". The traditional characters of "么4". Also known as "No 3". Also known as "What 3".
(1) "So" and "So" in the provincial language.
(2) Suffix.
(3) Used as a lining word for lyrics.
庅
